p: This is also called the palm family, which contains approximately 2400 species. Despite being considered a tropical family, palms can be found worldwide, except in Antarctica. The northernmost palm is the European fan palm ( Chamaerops humilis; Mediterranean areas in Europe and North Africa) and the southernmost is the nikau palm ( Rhopalostylis sapida; New Zealand). Among the most recognized species are coconut, date, and oil palms.
